snippet: It’s been more than a decade since the last original episode of “Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood,” but Fred Rogers’s lessons will return in an animated series called “Daniel Tiger’s Neighborhood.”
abstract: PBS children's show Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood is an animated version of the channel's now- defunct Mister Rogers' Neighborhood; new series is aimed at a narrow demographic of 2-to-4-year-olds, but retains important elements of the original program, like focusing on feelings and life lessons rather than being strictly educational.
lead_paragraph: It’s been more than a decade since the last original episode of “Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood,” but Fred Rogers’s lessons will return in an animated series called “Daniel Tiger’s Neighborhood.”

headline.seo: ‘Daniel Tiger’s Neighborhood’ in Mr. Rogers’s Tradition
headline.main: PBS Is Going Back to the Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: PBS Is Going Back To the Neighborhood
